Summary: This Dr.Ibrahim.....www.ufo-egyptian-hunter.org......This unique film shot at 2001 and it was misplaced till I foud it mixed with my plenty big UFO tapes colloctions which I personaly shot and recorded during my researches to find the truth about UFO .
divs: Sighting DetailsThis one was very strangs UFO ,I shot it during 10 Feb 2001 ,at about 8 pm in the period of 24 minutes. The shooting location was from balcony in the first floor,and the object was appear by optical vision like a single bright star but bigger in the size and lower in it's altitude ,as was appear between the front buildings and it was very easy to me to catch and record by my camera all its route, it was in the direction of Giza Pyramids ,but comming from higher altitude to lower altitude. Herewith I will send you the most important 9 fotos in three parts as your CMS accepts only three images and I tried before to send some video films but failed. Thanks in advance ,with best wishes from Egypt to all of your working-team Dr.Ibrahim Egyptian Ufologist www.ufo-egyptian-hunter.org
